birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省台州专区天台县
birth_place.en: Tiantai County, Taizhou Prefecture, Zhejiang Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。现任中共福建省委书记、福建省人大常委会主任、中共二十届中央委员。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China. He is the current Secretary of the Fujian Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Fujian Provincial People's Congress, and a member of the 20th Central Committee of the CCP.

nodes.id: 中国共产党福建省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党福建省委员会
en: Fujian Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在福建省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Fujian Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。
description.en: Chinese politician.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任福建省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Governor of Fujian Province.

description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for national human resources and social security administration.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: The permanent working body of the Central Commission for Public Sector Reform, a directly affiliated institution of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。
description.en: Chinese politician.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所综合性大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国学者，曾任同济大学党委书记。
description.en: Chinese scholar, former Party Secretary of Tongji University.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任同济大学党委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Party Secretary of Tongji University.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国浙江省杭州市的一所综合性大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university located in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家。

en: 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国浙江省台州市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Taizhou City, Zhejiang Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院院士，地质学家。
description.en: Academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, geologist.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会负责组织工作的部门。
description.en: The organization department of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委组织部部长。

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委组织部部长。

description.en: The department of the CPC Central Committee responsible for party organization work.

nodes.id: 中央巡视工作领导小组

zh-cn: 中央巡视工作领导小组
en: Central Leading Group for Inspection Work

description.zh-cn: 中共中央的议事协调机构，负责领导党内的巡视工作。
description.en: A coordinating body of the CPC Central Committee responsible for leading the party's inspection work.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十三届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十三届全国委员会
en: 13th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的第十三届全国委员会。
description.en: The 13th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼于1984年6月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Zhou Zuyi joined the Communist Party of China in June 1984.

description.zh-cn: 1984年7月，周祖翼毕业于浙江大学地质学系，获理学学士学位。
description.en: In July 1984, Zhou Zuyi graduated from the Department of Geology at Zhejiang University with a Bachelor of Science degree.

description.zh-cn: 1989年10月，周祖翼在同济大学海洋地质与地球物理系获理学博士学位。
description.en: In October 1989, Zhou Zuyi obtained a Doctor of Science degree from the Department of Marine Geology and Geophysics at Tongji University.

description.zh-cn: 朱夏是周祖翼在同济大学攻读博士学位期间的导师。
description.en: Zhu Xia was Zhou Zuyi's advisor during his doctoral studies at Tongji University.

position.zh-cn: 历任海洋地质与地球物理系副教授、副系主任，理学院党委书记，校党委副书记，校党委常务副书记兼副校长
position.en: Successively served as Associate Professor and Deputy Head of the Department of Marine Geology and Geophysics, Party Secretary of the School of Science, Deputy Party Secretary of the university, and Executive Deputy Party Secretary and Vice President of the university

position.zh-cn: 上海市委组织部副部长
position.en: Deputy Head of the Organization Department of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼担任上海市委组织部副部长期间，沈红光是时任部长。
description.en: While Zhou Zuyi served as Deputy Head of the Organization Department of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee, Shen Hongguang was the Head of the department.

position.zh-cn: 上海市委组织部副部长
position.en: Deputy Head of the Organization Department of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼担任上海市委组织部副部长期间，李希是时任部长。
description.en: While Zhou Zuyi served as Deputy Head of the Organization Department of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee, Li Xi was the Head of the department.

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼接替周家伦出任同济大学党委书记。
description.en: Zhou Zuyi succeeded Zhou Jialun as the Party Secretary of Tongji University.

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼离任同济大学党委书记，由杨贤金接任。
description.en: Zhou Zuyi left his position as Party Secretary of Tongji University, and was succeeded by Yang Xianjin.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

position.zh-cn: 部务委员兼干部二局局长、副部长
position.en: Member of the Ministerial Affairs Committee and Director of the Second Bureau for Cadres, Vice Minister

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼于2014年8月任中共中央组织部部务委员兼干部二局局长，2016年10月升任副部长。
description.en: Zhou Zuyi was appointed as a member of the Ministerial Affairs Committee and Director of the Second Bureau for Cadres of the Central Organization Department in August 2014, and was promoted to Vice Minister in October 2016.

relationships.target: 中央巡视工作领导小组

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼调任中组部后，进入中央巡视工作领导小组。
description.en: After being transferred to the Central Organization Department, Zhou Zuyi became a member of the Central Leading Group for Inspection Work.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十三届全国委员会
中央机构编制委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼接替张纪南出任中央机构编制委员会办公室主任。
description.en: Zhou Zuyi succeeded Zhang Jinan as Director of the State Commission Office for Public Sector Reform.

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼离任中央机构编制委员会办公室主任，由李小新接任。
description.en: Zhou Zuyi left his position as Director of the State Commission Office for Public Sector Reform, and was succeeded by Li Xiaoxin.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国人力资源和社会保障部

position.zh-cn: 人力资源和社会保障部部长
position.en: Minister of Human Resources and Social Security

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼担任人力资源和社会保障部部长期间，李克强是时任国务院总理。
description.en: While Zhou Zuyi served as Minister of Human Resources and Social Security, Li Keqiang was the Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼接替张纪南出任中华人民共和国人力资源和社会保障部部长。
description.en: Zhou Zuyi succeeded Zhang Jinan as Minister of Human Resources and Social Security of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼离任人力资源和社会保障部部长，由王晓萍接任。
description.en: Zhou Zuyi left his position as Minister of Human Resources and Social Security, and was succeeded by Wang Xiaoping.

relationships.target: 中国共产党福建省委员会

position.en: Secretary of the Fujian Provincial Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼担任福建省委书记，向以习近平为总书记的党中央负责。
description.en: As Secretary of the Fujian Provincial Party Committee, Zhou Zuyi is responsible to the Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping as General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼接替尹力出任中共福建省委书记。
description.en: Zhou Zuyi succeeded Yin Li as Secretary of the CPC Fujian Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 周祖翼担任福建省委书记期间，赵龙担任福建省省长，两人为同事。
description.en: While Zhou Zuyi served as Secretary of the Fujian Provincial Party Committee, Zhao Long served as Governor of Fujian Province; they were colleagues.

relationships.target: 福建省人民代表大会常务委员会
中国共产党第二十届中央委员会
